Topic.Title: Object description box not working, no text in player.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello. When I try to edit object descriptions, the cursor changes to loading. Also, When I try to run my game in the player, no text shows up! What could the problem be?

EDIT: I LIKE EDITING POSTS!
Posts.HTML:
Hello. When I try to edit object descriptions, the cursor changes to loading. Also, When I try to run my game in the player, no text shows up! What could the problem be?

EDIT: I LIKE EDITING POSTS!

Posts.EditableText: What version of Windows and what version of IE are you using?
Posts.HTML: What version of Windows and what version of IE are you using?

Posts.EditableText:
I'm using Windows Vista 32-bit. I don't like IE, but I heard IE 9 had a major interface overhaul. So I installed, it, and it was okay, but after a while it stopped working. Does Quest need IE to work?

EDIT: Thanks for making Quest OSS BTW.
Posts.HTML:
I'm using Windows Vista 32-bit. I don't like IE, but I heard IE 9 had a major interface overhaul. So I installed, it, and it was okay, but after a while it stopped working. Does Quest need IE to work?

EDIT: Thanks for making Quest OSS BTW.

Posts.EditableText: Quest embeds IE for output, so if your IE is broken, Quest won't work. Try reinstalling IE9 and try disabling plugins.
Posts.HTML: Quest embeds IE for output, so if your IE is broken, Quest won't work. Try reinstalling IE9 and try disabling plugins.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks, I uninstalled IE9. Now with IE8 things work perfectly.
Posts.HTML: Thanks, I uninstalled IE9. Now with IE8 things work perfectly.
